x_qune_da_error_code.remediation: If the Device is in scope for Discovery: 1. Configure SNMP System OID and associate it with corresponding SNMP Classfier. 2. If SNMP Classifier is not configured, configure SNMP Classifier, configure SNMP System OID and associate it with the corresponding SNMP Classifier.
x_qune_da_error_code.root_cause: Classification error on SNMP Device due to: 1. SNMP System OID not created and associated with the corresponding SNMP Classifier. 2. SNMP Classifier not configured and associated with the corresponding SNMP System OID.
